channel.title: [Delta] Unable to attack
channel.description:
Hey guys i have been updating pvp recently on my delta server (317)
And i am completely unable to attack other players on my server!
Pvm works fine i have no idea how this could have happened anyone think they can help me?!?!

item.title: [Delta] Unable to attack
item.dc:creator: @looted_y00 looted y00
item.description:
@looted_y00 wrote:

Well, thats for trying to help me i found this!
The quoted out part was being a bitch so i got rid of it and now i can fight other players!

Buuut range still doesnt work!

[code]
AttackingOn2.actionlog = 10;
if((AttackingOn2.IsAttacking) && (IsAttacking = true))
{
secs = 30;

/if (!canAttack(AttackingOn2)) {
ResetAttack();
return false;
}/[/code]

Read full topic

@mista_pnut wrote:

item.title: [Delta] Unable to attack
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

If there isn’t the option to attack at all add this under
public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

public void rightClickCheck() { if(isInWilderness == false) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("null"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } if(isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) || isInPitGame()) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } }

search for outStream.writeString(“Follow”);
If you already have something for Attack, remove it and call for the void you added. right above the follow method.

Read full topic
